Uses of Class
com.facility.maintenance.Maintenance

  • Packages that use Maintenance 
    Package Description
    com.facility.dal  
    com.facility.service  

    • Uses of Maintenance in com.facility.dal

      Methods in com.facility.dal that return Maintenance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Maintenance MaintenanceDAO.makeFacilityMaintRequest(Facility fac, java.lang.String maintenanceDetails, int cost)
      Creates a new maintenance request and inserts it into the maint_request table.
      Methods in com.facility.dal that return types with arguments of type Maintenance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Maintenance> MaintenanceDAO.listMaintenance(Facility fac)
      Lists Maintenance objects from the maintenance table that have already been completed at a particular facility.
      java.util.List<Maintenance> MaintenanceDAO.listMaintRequests(Facility fac)
      Lists Maintenance objects from the maint_request table that have yet to be scheduled/completed at a particular facility.
      Methods in com.facility.dal with parameters of type Maintenance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MaintenanceDAO.scheduleMaintenance(Maintenance maintRequest)
      Schedules a maintenance request by first adding it to the maintenance table and then removing it from the maint_request table.

    • Uses of Maintenance in com.facility.service

      Methods in com.facility.service that return Maintenance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Maintenance MaintenanceService.makeFacilityMaintRequest(Facility fac, java.lang.String maintenanceDetails, int cost)
      Creates a new maintenance request specifying the facility, maintenance details, and the cost.
      Methods in com.facility.service that return types with arguments of type Maintenance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Maintenance> MaintenanceService.listFacilityProblems(Facility fac)
      Lists all problems that have affected a particular facility including current maintenance requests and completed maintenance.
      java.util.List<Maintenance> MaintenanceService.listMaintenance(Facility fac)
      Lists maintenance that has already been completed at a particular facility.
      java.util.List<Maintenance> MaintenanceService.listMaintRequests(Facility fac)
      Lists maintenance requests that have yet to be scheduled/completed at a particular facility.
      Methods in com.facility.service with parameters of type Maintenance 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MaintenanceService.scheduleMaintenance(Maintenance maintRequest)
      Schedules a maintenance request by moving the request from the table of maintenance requests to the table of completed maintenance.
